content.rendered:
Know UPSC Exam Structure & Eligibility 

Course Details

UPSC ADMISSION 2022

S.NoCourse DetailsGeneral Studies – PCM + CSAT
1UPSC Regular Prelims cum Mains Batch
Wednesday to Sunday (10 am to 1 pm)		Rs. 55, 000
2UPSC Weekend Prelims cum Mains Batch
Saturday & Sunday (10 am to 5 pm)		Rs. 55, 000
3UPSC Regular Prelims BatchRs. 30, 000
4UPSC Weekend Prelims Batch Rs. 30, 000
5UPSC Weekend Mains Batch Rs. 30, 000
6Optional Subject
1. Geography
2. Public Administration
3. Language (Tamil literature)

Enquiry Form

Fill the form below. Our Student counsellor will get back to you shortly.

Course Includes

  • Study Materials
  • Foundation course (NCERT)
  • Monthly Current Affairs
  • Weekly Test
  • Cycle Test(15 Prelims + 15 Mains)
  • Prelim’s Test Series (20 GS + 12 CSAT)
  • Mains Test Series (20 GS)

Our Highlights

  • A well-experienced faculty team
  • Guest Lectures by Officers
  • Mentorship (Personal Guidance)
  • Individual Attention
  • Continuous Student Assessment
  • Interview Guidance
2018-2019 Batch

Our Achievers

UPSC

Our Admission Process:

  • We have chosen the principle of “first-come-first-served” as the basis of admission in our institute & also from Upsc Scholarship exam
  • The candidates or their representatives are required to be present at CHENNAI IAS ACADEMY office, with the duly filled-up application form with one passport size and one stamp size photographs, photocopy of valid photo ID & Address Proof of the candidate.
  • After admission to any of the course, if there is any indiscipline or misbehavior on the part of the students, they may be expelled, without any explanation. The right to rusticate rests solely with the management.

Course fees include: Classes, Study Materials, Test Series, Previous Question paper & Monthly UPSC Current Affairs
